name: make_call
description: Make a call to a single recipient with exactly one phone number endpoint; use `show_call_recipient_choices` first if the recipient has multiple endpoints or if a Geofencing Policy applies.

contact_id.description: The unique identifier for the contact.

contact_endpoints.description: A list of dictionaries representing phone number endpoints, each with an `endpoint_value` key.

contact_photo_url.description: The URL of the contact's profile photo.

recipient.description: An object containing recipient details, including `contact_id`, `contact_name`, `contact_endpoints`, `contact_photo_url`, `recipient_type` ("CONTACT", "BUSINESS", "DIRECT", or "VOICEMAIL"), `address`, and `distance`.

on_speakerphone.description: If `True`, places the call on speakerphone. Defaults to `False`.

recipient_photo_url.description: The URL of the recipient's profile photo.

name: prepare_call
description: Prepare a call to one or more recipients.

contact_endpoints.description: List of endpoints for the contact

contact_photo_url.description: URL to the contact's profile photo

recipients.description: A list of recipient objects, where each object can contain details such as `contact_id`, `contact_name`, `contact_endpoints`, `recipient_type`, and `address`.

name: show_call_recipient_choices
description: Displays a list of recipients for the user to select from when there are multiple recipient or phone number options, confidence in a single recipient is low, or a Geofencing Policy applies.

contact_endpoints.description: List of endpoints for the contact

contact_photo_url.description: URL to the contact's profile photo

recipients.description: A list of recipient objects to display as choices, where each object contains details like `contact_id`, `contact_name`, and `contact_endpoints`.

name: show_call_recipient_not_found_or_specified
description: Displays a message when a search for a call recipient fails or when a recipient is not specified.

contact_name.description: The name of the recipient that was searched for.
